goals__remit:
Experienced impact investment manager with 20 years of professional experience in financial services.  
Structured MIF II Impact Venture Fund, Mozaik Impact Fund, Regional Social Business Fund. Helped develop and launch Mozaik Social Business Incubator. Overall financial expertise spans from SME access-to-finance issues, to risk management and complex corporate finance transactions. He has previously held senior management and finance roles with private equity and international corporate groups and IFIs. Work includes: Restructuring € 100 million Deposit Insurance Fund; Restructuring US$4 billion sovereign debt with international creditors (World Bank, IMF, Paris and London Clubs, EBRD, EUROFIMA); European € 500 million commercial real estate syndication; Advisory roles on risk management issues, regulatory framework (minimum capital requirements/own funds, assessments and credit risk evaluation of banks and companies), corporate finance strategies, enterprise and financial risk management policy and systems, and securities market development.
